member.name: P:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaBindingAttribute.BoundType
member.summary: An binding connected to this type

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaMetaTableAttribute
member.summary: Apply this attribute to classes to change the metatable type name they'll receive in Lua

member.name: P:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaMetaTableAttribute.Name
member.summary: The desired metatable type name in Lua

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaMetaTableAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: When applying the attribute to a class you can specify a metatable type name
member.param: The metatable type name

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaMethodAttribute
member.summary: Apply this attribute to methods that should be exposed to Lua.

member.name: P:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaMethodAttribute.Name
member.summary: The name this method will receive in Lua.

member.name: P:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaMethodAttribute.IsOverloaded
member.summary: Indicates if multiple methods exist with the same name as the one this attribute is applied to.

member.name: P:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaMethodAttribute.IsConstructor
member.summary: Whether the method marked with this attribute is the constructor of the given class. This means the static functions table will get a __call metamethod that will call this method.
member.example:
That allows you to do this in Lua:
local exampleObject = Example()

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaMethodAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: When applying this attribute to methods that should expose to Lua you can specify a name in this constructor.
member.param: The name the method should receive in Lua

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaMethodAttribute.CallGenericFunction(GmodNET.API.ILua,System.Reflection.MethodBase,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Pushes a dummy function which will accept only a table with types. That function will return the real function.

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaMethodAttribute.PushFunction(GmodNET.API.ILua,System.Reflection.MethodBase,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Pushes a function to the Lua stack. Lua can call the provided method and this function will automatically convert the arguments. If a method is overloaded a finder will be activated to inspect the stack and find the appropriate method to call.
member.param: The method to push to the Lua stack
The type id of the object instance's metatable or null if static
Forces the method to be pushed, never pushing the finder

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaMethodAttribute.ExecuteMethod(System.Object,GmodNET.API.ILua,System.Reflection.MethodBase)
member.summary: Simply runs the specified method on the provided instance, picking arguments from the stack.
member.param: The object to run the method on
The method to execute

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaMethodAttribute.FindAndExecuteMethod(System.Type,System.Object,GmodNET.API.ILua,System.String)
member.summary: Finds a method based on the signature formed by the arguments on the Lua stack

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaPropertyAttribute
member.summary: Apply this attribute to property methods that should be exposed to Lua.

member.name: P:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaPropertyAttribute.Name
member.summary: The name this property will receive in Lua.

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.LuaPropertyAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: When applying this attribute to methods that should expose to Lua you can specify a name in this constructor.
member.param: The name the method should receive in Lua

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.Annotating.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains annotations to mark .NET members so they're exposed to Lua.

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.DataTransforming.BaseLuaValueTransformer
member.summary: Nothing should derive from this class. It is only for detecting which classes are transformers, without having to provide a generic type.
member.remarks: If you'd like to create your own transformer you should inherit

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.DataTransforming.BetweenObjectArrayAndMultipleResults
member.summary: Transformers from an object array to multiple Lua return types or vice versa.
member.example:
Consider this in C#:
return object[]{ 1, 2, 3, 4 }
Would equal this in Lua after the transformer is used:
return 1, 2, 3, 4

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.DataTransforming.BetweenStringListAndTable
member.summary: Transformers from a string list to a Lua table or vice versa.

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.DataTransforming.LuaValueTransformer`1
member.summary: Transformers derive from this class. Transformers help convert between .NET and Lua types.
member.example:
Your subclass MUST register which type it converts to and from by registering with the following attribute.
[ConvertsNetType(typeof(ExampleClass))]
member.typeparam: The type to return or accept in the methods

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.DataTransforming.LuaValueTransformer`1.#ctor
member.summary: Since a transformer is instantiated with Activator.CreateInstance there should be no parameters on the constructor.

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.DataTransforming.LuaValueTransformer`1.Convert(GmodNET.API.ILua,`0)
member.summary: Converts a given .NET object and pushes it on the Lua stack.
member.param: The .NET object to convert to Lua
member.returns: The amount of objects pushed to the Lua stack

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.DataTransforming.LuaValueTransformer`1.TryParse(GmodNET.API.ILua,`0@,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Pulls or reads an object from the Lua stack at the given position and tries to convert it to a .NET object.
member.param: The value pulled from the Lua stack
The position to pull/read the object from
Keep the object on the stack, false to remove it
member.returns: Whether the value was succesfully parsed

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.DataTransforming.LuaTransformerExtensions
member.summary: Adds extensions relating to data transformation.

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.DataTransforming.LuaTransformerExtensions.ApplyTransformerConvert(GmodNET.API.ILua,System.Type,System.Object)
member.summary: Instantiates a transformer of the given type and serves it the value to convert to Lua.
member.param: The type of the transformer class (must inherit )
The value to have the transformer convert to Lua
member.returns: The amount of Lua objects pushed to the stack by the transformer
member.exception: Thrown when the transformer type given does not inherit

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.DataTransforming.LuaTransformerExtensions.ApplyTransformerParse(GmodNET.API.ILua,System.Type,System.Object@,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Instantiates a transformer of the given type and executes it's TryParse to parse a value at the given Lua stack position.
member.param: The type of the transformer class (must inherit )
The value pulled from the Lua stack
The position to pull/read the object from
Keep the object on the stack, false to remove it
member.returns: Whether the value was succesfully parsed as returned by the transformer's method.
member.exception: Thrown when the transformer type given does not inherit

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.DataTransforming.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains transformers that help convert between .NET and Lua types.

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaExtensions

member.summary: Prints a message in Lua the next Lua tick
member.param: The message to show

member.summary: Prints a message in Lua
member.param: The message to show

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaExtensions.GetStack(GmodNET.API.ILua)
member.summary: Builds a string representation of the stack by traversing all values on the Lua stack.
member.returns: A string containing the types on the stack

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaFunctionReference
member.summary: A reference to a Lua function which can be called later.

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaFunctionReference.#ctor(GmodNET.API.ILua,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a reference for the function currently on the given position of the stack (or the top by default)
member.param: The stack position of the function to reference
Keep the object on the stack, false to remove it

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaFunctionReference.Call(System.Object[])
member.summary: Call this Lua function without expecting results
member.param: The parameters to pass to the Lua function
member.remarks: Do not call this method from an async method. Instead use .

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaFunctionReference.Call(System.Int32,System.Object[])
member.summary: Call this Lua function expecting multiple results
member.param: The amount of results we expect from the Lua function
The parameters to pass to the Lua function
member.returns: The returned results in an object array
member.remarks: Do not call this method from an async method. Instead use .

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaFunctionReference.Call``1(System.Object[])
member.summary: Call this Lua function expecting a scalar result
member.typeparam: The type we expect of the result
member.param: The parameters to pass to the Lua function
member.returns: The returned result as the provided type
member.remarks: Do not call this method from an async method. Instead use .

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaFunctionReference.CallFromAsync(System.Object[])
member.summary: This queues the function to be called back once Lua is ready to process it on the main thread.
member.param: The parameters to pass to the Lua function

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaFunctionReference.CallFromAsync(System.Int32,System.Object[])
member.summary: This queues the function to be called back once Lua is ready to process it on the main thread.
member.param: The amount of results we expect from the Lua function
The parameters to pass to the Lua function
member.returns: A task that's called to return the result as the provided type

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaFunctionReference.CallFromAsync``1(System.Object[])
member.summary: This queues the function to be called back once Lua is ready to process it on the main thread.
member.typeparam: The type we expect of the result
member.param: The parameters to pass to the Lua function
member.returns: A task that's called to return the result as the provided type

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaMetaObjectBinding
member.summary: The baseclass from which metatable classes can inherit. These classes specify how the metatable should look in Lua. Metatable classes can be marked with [LuaMetaTable] to give them an explicit type name. Otherwise their class name will be used.

member.name: P:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaMetaObjectBinding.MetaTableTypeId
member.summary: The metatable type id for this object, as returned by `lua.CreateMetaTable`

member.name: P:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaMetaObjectBinding.Reference
member.summary: The pointer to the Lua instance of this object. Only filled when a method on this class is called from Lua.

member.name: F:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaMetaObjectBinding.lua
member.summary: The Lua environment where this object lives

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaMetaObjectBinding.#ctor(GmodNET.API.ILua)
member.summary: Instantiates the .NET Object, informing it of the Lua environment it's part of.
member.param: The Lua environment where this object lives

member.summary: A reference to a Lua object, for example a table.

member.summary: The Lua environment where the reference lives

member.name: F:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaReference.pointer
member.summary: The pointer to the reference in Lua which can be pushed with `lua.ReferencePush` or freed with `lua.ReferenceFree`

Keep the object on the stack, false to remove it

member.summary: Called to dispose of the object. Calls

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaTaskScheduler
member.summary: Helps schedule tasks to be executed safely from asynchronous methods.

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaTaskScheduler.AddTask(System.Action)
member.summary: Have an action be called from the Lua context safely and expect nothing to be returned.
member.param: The action to call in the Lua context
member.returns: A task that yields no result

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaTaskScheduler.AddTask``1(System.Func{``0})
member.summary: Have a function be called from the Lua context safely and expect the given type to be returned.
member.typeparam: The type you expect to be returned
member.param: The function to be called in the Lua context
member.returns: A task that yields a result of the given type

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaTaskScheduler.ProcessQueue(GmodNET.API.ILua)
member.summary: Check if there's tasks queued and call them immediately.
member.returns: Always 0 to inform Lua that nothing was returned from this hook

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaTaskScheduler.RegisterLuaCallback(GmodNET.API.ILua)
member.summary: Link the LuaTaskScheduler with Lua by hooking into Tick.

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaTaskScheduler.UnregisterLuaCallback(GmodNET.API.ILua)
member.summary: Unlink the LuaTaskScheduler from Lua by removing the appropriate Tick hook.

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains tools to bind .NET objects with Lua comfortably

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.ReferenceManager
member.summary: Helps keep track of handles and disposables. Call to clean up any active handles.

member.summary: Registers a handle so it can be cleaned up with later.
member.param: The handle to register

member.summary: Registers a disposable so it can be cleaned up with later.
member.param: The disposable object to register

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.ReferenceManager.KillAll
member.summary: Dispose and free all registered disposable objects and handles respectively.

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools
member.summary: Helps converting between .NET objects/types and Lua types

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools.DiscoverDataTransformers
member.summary: Iterates all Transformers and registers their Type for later use. In order to create a transformer you should inherit LuaValueTransformer

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools.CreateBindings(GmodNET.API.ILua,System.Type,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Automatically creates bindings for the given type, detecting suitable constructors, methods and properties using reflection.
member.param: The type to scan for suitable constructors, methods and properties to bind to Lua
Only create bindings for methods and properties that are annotated

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools.CreateBindings(GmodNET.API.ILua,GmodMongoDb.Binding.LuaBinding,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Automatically creates bindings for the given type, detecting suitable constructors, methods and properties using reflection.
member.param: The binding that defines the type and handles events
Only create bindings for methods and properties that are annotated

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools.CreateDiscoveredMetaTableDefinitions(GmodNET.API.ILua)
member.summary: Eagerly search for metatable definitions and create the metatables.

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools.CleanUpMetaTables(GmodNET.API.ILua)
member.summary: Cleans up the static tables made with

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools.GenerateUserDataFromObject(GmodNET.API.ILua,System.Object)
member.summary: Generates userdata with a metatable by looking at attributes on the given object. Pushes the userdata onto the stack.
member.param: The object to generate into userdata
member.returns: The metatable type id that was created for this userdata

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools.PushManagedObject(GmodNET.API.ILua,System.Object)
member.summary:
Pushes a .NET managed object onto the stack as userdata.
Consider using if you want to interact with the userdata from Lua.
member.param: The object to convert to userdata and push
member.returns: Returns the metatable type id which was applied to the userdata

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools.PullManagedObject(GmodNET.API.ILua,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Pull userdata from the stack at the given position that has the given type id. Converts it to a .NET object.
member.param: The metatable type id of the userdata as returned by or
The position of the managed object
Keep the object on the stack, false to remove it
member.returns: The .NET object converted from Lua
member.exception: Thrown when a null pointer is found or the userdata is no longer valid

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools.PushType(GmodNET.API.ILua,System.Type,System.Object)
member.summary: Push a value of a specific type to the Lua stack. Applies a transformer where possible.
member.param: The type of the value to push
The value to push

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools.PullType(GmodNET.API.ILua,System.Type,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Pop a value from the Lua stack and convert it to the specified .NET type.
member.param: The expected type of the value on the stack
The position of the value
Order the function not to pop after getting the value
member.returns: The .NET object

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools.PullType(GmodNET.API.ILua,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Pop a value from the Lua stack and try convert it to an associated .NET type.
member.param: The position of the value
Order the function not to pop after getting the value
member.returns: The .NET object

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools.PullType``1(GmodNET.API.ILua,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Pop a value from the Lua stack and convert it to the specified .NET type.
member.typeparam: The expected type of the value on the stack
member.param: The position of the value
Order the function not to pop after getting the value
member.returns: The .NET object

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools.TryGetMetaTableType(System.Int32,System.Type@)
member.summary: Try to convert a Lua type to a metatable.
member.param: The type id that's suspected to be a metatable type
The converted .NET type on success. Null otherwise.
member.returns: If the type is succesfully converted to a metatable type.

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools.LuaTypeToDotNetType(GmodNET.API.TYPES)
member.summary: Convert a specified Lua type to a .NET type.
member.param: The Lua type to convert
member.returns: The converted .NET type

member.name: M:GmodMongoDb.Binding.TypeTools.LuaTypeToDotNetType(System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert a specified Lua type to a .NET type.
member.param: The Lua type to convert (must be castable to )
member.returns: The converted .NET type

member.name: T:GmodMongoDb.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains the userdata definitions that expose the .NET MongoDB Driver to Lua.
